ch0257_41_qibana/0101_0701_02_10:
I always run wild in battle! Even if a sandstorm
were to blow through on a special day, I’d still
win with a smile!
ch0257_41_qibana/7101_0701_01_10:
You ever hear the saying, “To hide a tree, put it
in a forest”?
ch0257_41_qibana/7101_0701_02_10:
Basically, it means things are harder to find
when they match their surroundings.
ch0257_41_qibana/7101_0701_03_10: In a sandstorm, this outfit would blend right in!
ch0257_41_qibana/7102_0701_01_10:
I like this outfit, but if I were to pick my favorite
thing about it...
ch0257_41_qibana/7102_0701_02_10:
I’d say I like how it gives off strong Sandaconda
vibes!
ch0257_41_qibana/7102_0701_03_10:
It’s the perfect outfit for bonding with my partner!
Don’t you think?
ch0257_41_qibana/7103_0701_01_10: About this neck wrap... Do you like it?
ch0257_41_qibana/7103_0701_02_10: It’s so cool how it flutters when I run!
ch0257_41_qibana/7104_0701_01_10:
I’ve heard disappearing under the cover of
darkness is a ninja technique, but...
ch0257_41_qibana/7104_0701_02_10:
The great Raihan will disappear under the cover
of a sandstorm!
ch0257_41_qibana/7104_0701_03_10: Even if you took a photo, it’d be like I’m not there!
ch0257_41_qibana/7105_0701_01_10:
[Name:PlayerNickname ]! How about a photo
to celebrate the occasion?
ch0257_41_qibana/1701_0701_01_10: Take this! It’s a gift from me!
ch0257_41_qibana/1701_0702_01_10:
If you keep it tucked away, I’m sure it’ll come in
handy!
ch0257_41_qibana/2501_0701_01_10: I heard this outfit is from the Johto region.
ch0257_41_qibana/2501_0701_02_10:
I wonder what sort of Pokémon and Trainers you’d
find in a place that came up with such an outfit.
ch0257_41_qibana/2501_0702_01_10:
The ninja Trainer who uses Poison-type Pokémon
is a Kanto Gym Leader...
ch0257_41_qibana/2501_0702_02_10:
Maybe there are ninja all over the world but
they’re just hiding?
ch0257_41_qibana/2511_0701_01_10:
I heard Adaman from the Diamond Clan is
apprenticing under a real ninja!
ch0257_41_qibana/2511_0701_02_10:
It seems he’s studying ninja techniques and
cooking.
ch0257_41_qibana/2511_0701_03_10: Ninja cooking, huh? I wonder how that tastes.
ch0257_41_qibana/2511_0702_01_10: At the end of the day, I just like to stand out.
ch0257_41_qibana/2511_0702_02_10:
I bet if I had a ninja master, they’d be angry with
me every day.
ch0257_41_qibana/3001_0701_01_10:
Let’s take a selfie with the sunrise as the
backdrop, then get on with training!
ch0257_41_qibana/3003_0701_01_10:
Taking care of yourself is a skill, you know!
Be careful of the sunlight if you’re walking around
during the day!
ch0257_41_qibana/3005_0701_01_10:
Feeling the hype of a stadium is nice, but I don’t
mind a quiet evening either.
